entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
